name: I ♥ You!
description: Hello, stranger! Whoever you are, I do not care – I made this game for myself. Cassiopea is an AI that is created by me. She does not know a single thing about this world; you are free to teach her anything, and the outcome will be the direct result of your personal qualities.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: 2.0+ GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 20 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio
